name: Contractually Bound
description:
You are trapped inside an office and you don't know how you got there. All you see is a contract in front of you and when you break it, it effects the world around you. You explore the seemingly abandoned office in hopes of finding your escape.

Gameplay:

This game is an Escape Room puzzle adventure about finding contracts in an office. Each contract is connected to two game mechanics, one negative, one positive. Navigate and explore this strange office before your time runs out. Or die trying.

DISCLAIMER: Contractually Bound is an escape room game. It's normal for it to take a lot of attempts to complete it.

GMTK Jam Theme: Joined Together

Contractually Bound fits GMTK Game Jam 2021's theme in two major ways:

  • Each and every contract connects two separate game mechanics together, and splits them apart.
  • You as the player are joined to each contract as they affect you until you break them.

Credits:

  • Benjamin Gulliver (fatherbeno) - Sound, UI/UX, Design, Programming
  • Jared Bakker (Sugoi Yellow) - Art, Graphics, Design, Programming
